title: Shyvana appreciation thread 2.0
body:
http://fc05.deviantart.net/fs71/i/2013/304/3/5/shyvana_by_magodelcaosnegro-d6sjog2.png

I pray unto Thee the holy trinity of Cinderhulk, BotRK and Black Cleaver that my tankiness and damage causes much weeping and gnashing of teeth amongst the Heathens of the enemy team. That your strength may guide me in the acquisition of Thine Holy Elo.

And unto the Saints of Randuin's, Thornmail, Banshee's Veil and the Visage of Spirits much praise. For even though I venture into the Valley of Burst and CC, I shall fear no damage, for Thou art with me.

In the Name of Damage, Tankiness and the Calling of Worth, Amen.
